page.title: 03Shopping
page.content: All the people in Boynton village shop in Bridlington as there are no shops in Boynton. They use four different supermarkets in Bridlington. Four families also use a mobile shop which comes into the village twice a week.It sells tinned foods,crisps,fruit,soft drinks, bread,buns,cigarettes and vegetables.It comes from Bridlington. People have to go into Bridlington for their newspapers but two ask the milkman to bring them a paper. Seventeen people do their shopping by car and five use the bus. There are thirty_two families in Boynton and seven families in don't have any cars, thirteen families have one car, eleven families have two cars. And one family has three cars.
